sets.title: Development
sets.tools: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, TailwindCSS, JavaScript (ES6+), SCSS, CraftCMS, GIT, Webpack, GraphQL, Vite
sets.description:
Strong understanding of the fundamentals in HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Working with modern standardisations such as CSS Grid and current ECMAScript.

Day to day I use Nuxt.js but also keen on exploring other JavaScript frameworks such as Next.js (React) for SSG and SSR. As JavaScript can be utilised on both the front and backend, I am working on side projects to have a working knowledge of the full stack with node based content management systems such as Strapi.

sets.title: Design
sets.description:
During my industry experience as a Graphic Designer I've worked extensively across the Adobe CC product range, Illustrator is my go-to for vector-based design, also for any illustration work I do. Photoshop for anything pixel based and image editing. InDesign for editorial and layout.

For prototyping / wireframing I use Figma. With the latter, I've found the ability to share my designs and receive live feedback through just a web browser requiring no software besides a browser on the clients end creates a frictionless experience for feedback.
